sources.title: Embryo
sources.description: A doctor (Rock Hudson) bypasses nature with growth hormones, producing a 22-year-old (Barbara Carrera) who becomes his lover.

sources.title: Embryo 1976 202401
sources.description: A scientist doing experiments on a human fetus discovers a method to accelerate the fetus into a mature adult in just a few days. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/embryo-1976/

sources.title: Embryo RockHudson
sources.description: 1970s retelling of the Frankenstein story with Rock Hudson as the scientist and Barbara Carrera as the 'creature' he grows from Embryo to Woman in four and a half weeks. Also stars Roddy McDowall, Diane Ladd and Dr Joyce Brothers. This movie was reissued in the 1980s a "Created to Kill". Public domain due to the omission of a required copyright notice. Sourced from a 30 year old Betamax tape.

sources.title: Embryo (1976) [Science Fiction] [Horror]
sources.description:
"Embryo" is a Science Fiction and Horror film directed by Ralph Nelson. The movie is about a scientist (Rock Hudson), who experiments on a fetus, accelerating its growth within weeks into a beautiful young woman (Barbara Carrera). The woman becomes his protégé—the lessons culminating one night in sex. But when she becomes pregnant, the woman begins to age rapidly. From there things go horribly wrong.

---

Directed by Ralph Nelson, produced by Anita Doohan and Arnold H. Orgolini, written by Anita Doohan and Jack W. Thomas, starring Rock Hudson, Barbara Carrera, Diane Ladd, Roddy McDowall, Anne Schedeen, John Elerick, Vincent Baggetta, Jack Colvin, Joyce Brothers, Dick Winslow, Ken Washington, Lina Raymond and Sherri Zak.

---

Source: "Embryo (1976 film)" Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia. Wikimedia Foundation, Inc.. 4 July 2013. Web. 22 July 2013. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Embryo_(1976_film).

If you like this movie and our channel, please subscribe: https://goo.gl/atJwQv

metadata.Plot: A scientist doing experiments on a human fetus discovers a method to accelerate the fetus into a mature adult in just a few days. However, the "adult" fetus turns into a homicidal psycho and looks for a new formula to prevent her from aging further.
metadata.Actors: Rock Hudson, Barbara Carrera, Diane Ladd
